item1.FIELD3: Ang paboritong Pinoy street food. Deep fried breaded quail eggs served with Dencio's special vinegar

item2.FIELD3: Squid rings na marinated at breaded then deep fried to golden perfection. Each servings comes with a special calamares dip

item3.FIELD3: Crunchy and deep fried mix na mas pinasarap na special sauce. Served on a sizzling plate

item4.FIELD3: Our tasty take on the traditional pork, dumpling soup with spring onions

item5.FIELD3: Nachos topped with tomato salsa at pina-Astig ng Dencio's Krispy Sisig. Dinagdagan pa ng cheese sauce drizzle for more flavor

item6.FIELD3: Fried chicken isaw with white onions, finger chili, and mayo for that zesty taste. Served on a sizzling plate

item7.FIELD3: Deep fried golden brown tofu na ginisa sa siling labuyo at red bell pepper. Simahan ng Dencio's vinegar

item8.FIELD3: A mix of finely chopped Baguio beans, ground pork at coconut milk na may saktong anghang

item9.FIELD3: Sari-saring gulay cooked in rich and flavourful peanut sauce. Served with Dencio's bagoong para kumpleto ang lasap sarap

item10.FIELD3: Chopped green mangoes, tomatoes at white onions served with special bagoong alamang

item11.FIELD3: Grilled eggplant stuffed with crabmeat sauteed in garlic and onions, coated with battered egg and pan fried until golden brown. Served with catsup

item12.FIELD3: Battered seasoned shrimps deep fried for that delicious crisp. Served with a special dipping sauce para mas complete and food experience

item13.FIELD3: Tuna cubes with cuts of cucumber peel doused in creamy white sauce. Sinamahan ng spring onions, red bell peppers, at finger chili

item14.FIELD3: Peeled shrimps sauteed in butter garlic, finger chili, at seasoning. Served on a sizzling plate

item15.FIELD3: Squid sauteed in garlic seasoning at white gravy. Served on a sizzling plate

item16.FIELD3: Premium bangus belly cooked with carrots, Baguio beans and mushrooms, generously seasoned with gravy. Served on sizzling plate

item17.FIELD3: Blanched kangkong served with special bagoong alamang

item18.FIELD3: Dencio's well-loved baked mussels with grated cheese at paprika topping

item19.FIELD3: Tripe at tofu on sticks made more delectable by our special soy glaze

item20.FIELD3: Deep fried coated kangkong with a tasty dip
